text: Helene Louise "Helli" Stehle (6 December 1907 - 27 August 2017) was a Swiss actress and radio presenter. Stehle was born on 6 December 1907 in Basel, Switzerland. She began working in radio in the 1920s. In 1939, she became Switzerland's first female newscaster. She was also an actress. Her most notable movie was De Tod uf em Oepfelbaum from 1966. She turned 100 in December 2007. When she died at the age of 109, she was one of the oldest living people in Switzerland. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Reportage über Helli Stehle (2008) * Bericht anlässlich von Stehles 103. Geburtstag mit Radiosendung von 1997 *Erste Radiosprecherin der Schweiz feiert ihren 100. title: Helli Stehle
